author: Tyler Clifford
title: Jim Cramer doubles down on Cedar Fair after Six Flags bid rejected
description: Investors should start a small position in amusement park operator Cedar Fair and buy more on a pullback, the "Mad Money" host says.
content:
CNBC's Jim Cramer on Monday likened buying shares in Six Flags Entertainment to "throwing good money after bad."
